title: Yoshida, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar ULQ; upper center
description: men on scaffolding repair a castle at R that overlooks a river; long trestle bridge cuts across bay at R with outlines of a daimyo procession; two boats head towards the bridge; village, trees, an a mountain in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
